quote-text: We feel deeply for you and about the situation in which you and your children find yourselves through no fault of your own. Although we understand [your ex-husband] is currently incarcerated, we have no way of knowing how long or short a time he will actually serve and we understand from court files that he may be released as early as next fall. In the interest of the safety of the students, faculty and parents at Holy Trinity School, we simply cannot allow you to return to work there, or, unfortunately, at any other school in the Diocese.
quote-source: The Diocese of San Diego, firing a teacher because her incarcerated ex-husband has a history of violent and abusive behavior, as quoted by Dylan Stableford in Teacher fired over ex-husbandâs âthreatening and menacingâ behavior, June 13, 2013 (via @FreeRangeKids).
